powers.title: Melee Weapon
powers.description: A simple melee weapon of your choice (Sword, Dagger, Axe, Whip, etc.)

powers.title: Ranged Weapon
powers.description: A simple ranged weapon of your choice (Bow, Crossbow, Throwing Dagger, Spear, Dart, etc.)

powers.title: Staff of Druid
powers.description: Strike earth, and a fountain of water will shoot up from that location for the next 10 minutes.
